0101101000110111 1100011011111000 1 -> sum: 0010000100110000, cout: 1

0011110001110100 0101010001101111 1 -> sum: 1001000011100100, cout: 0
0100111101011101 0010001111100010 1 -> sum: 0111001101000000, cout: 0
1000100111100011 0110111101001001 1 -> sum: 1111100100101101, cout: 0
0101001100001100 0011001001110110 1 -> sum: 1000010110000011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
